thread.section_title: Busbud Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Busbud | www.busbud.com
thread.title: inger fabricant

author: inger fabricant
title: inger fabricant
text:
My husband and I made a booking via Busbud for a trip Sevilla - Malaga for mid-February 2017. For various reasons we sadly had to cancel the whole Portugal trip. I contacted Busbud to find out if there was any chance of some kind of reimbursement, full or partial, for our tickets. I sent in this query Sunday am - and got a reply not many hours later - full refund!!
Amazing service!!I Next time, when we re-book this aborted trip, i will use Busbud for sure! I wish you all the best of luck with your company!
Kind regards,
Inger F
